#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int a[1003000],b[1003000],c[1003000];
int able(int n) {

	int sum = n;
	while (n)
	{
		sum += n % 10;
		n =n/10;
	}
	return sum;
}
void get() {

	for (int n = 1; n <= 1003000; n = able(n)) {
		a[n] = true;
	}
	for (int n = 3; n <= 1003000; n = able(n)) {
		b[n] = true;
	}
	for (int n = 9; n <= 1003000; n = able(n)) {
		c[n] = true;
	}
}

int main()
{
	get();
	int t = 0;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin >> n;
		while (true)
		 {
			if (a[n])
			 {
				cout << "1 " << n << '\n';
				break;
			}
			if (b[n])
			{
				cout << "3 " << n << '\n';
				break;
			}
			if (c[n])
			{
				cout << "9 " << n << '\n';
				break;
			}
			n = able(n);
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
